import React, { Component } from "react"; import { prices } from "../constants/Prices"; import "../App.css"; const Cart = (props) => { const cartList = props.cart && props.cart.map((item) => { return (

{item.name}

{item.size}

${prices[item.name]}

{item.quantity}

${prices[item.name]*item.quantity}

); }); console.log(props.getTotalQuantity(), "total quantity"); console.log(props.cartLength, "cartLength"); let tax = props.getSubtotal() * 0.08875; return (

CART ({props.getTotalQuantity()}):

{props.cartLength > 0 ? (

Item

Size

Price

Quantity

Total

{cartList}

Subtotal: ${props.getSubtotal()}

Subtotal:
Shipping:
Tax:

Total:
${props.getSubtotal()}.00
$4.99
${tax.toFixed(2)}

${(props.getSubtotal() + 4.99 + tax).toFixed(2)}
) : (

Your Cart is Empty

)}
); }; export default Cart;
